sentences.english: And we scheduled it and we get it and my dad and my sister would help trim it.
sentences.chinese: 先做安排然後實踐，爸爸和姐姐會幫忙修剪聖誕樹。

sentences.english: Daddy what do you call that thingamajig?
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，你們把那個叫什麼？

sentences.english: My father has a diesel-engined truck.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸有一輛柴油引擎的卡車。

sentences.english: That was so cool! Hey, Dad, did you see that?
sentences.chinese: 哇，好好玩啦嘿，爸爸看到沒有？

sentences.english: It's my Daddy, the actor, about to die with his boots on.
sentences.chinese: 那是我爸爸，那個演員，即將橫死的畫面。

sentences.english: Although the farm is large, my Dad has two men working for him.
sentences.chinese: 儘管農場較大，我爸爸只僱了兩個人幫他幹活。

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad's sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借來他爸爸的跑車以討得女友歡心。

sentences.english: With the coming of national day, I have a one week holiday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天，爸爸媽媽和我去牡丹園遊玩。

sentences.english: ShangMingYang father came to visit troops, both father and son a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 湯名揚的爸爸來到部隊探望兒子，父子二人促膝談心。

sentences.english: When his father fell ill, Tom rushed home from work.
sentences.chinese: 當爸爸生病，湯姆快速從上班的地方奔回了家。

sentences.english: He had become very still. Saliva was at the corners of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸已經一動不動了，嘴角上還淌着口水。

sentences.english: My father shouldered the door shut and carried the gift to our kitchen table.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸用肩抵上門，然後把禮物抱到廚房的桌上。

sentences.english: The world can not conquers your Dad.
sentences.chinese: 天下事難不倒你的爸爸。

sentences.english: Dad will buy me a car.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸將會買了一臺車給我。

sentences.english: As long as grandpa's grandmother be on the hoof, they would assurance father be also deathless .
sentences.chinese: 只要爺爺奶奶活着，他們會保證爸爸也不死。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
